original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary:
"U.S. halts billions in aid to Ukraine over corruption concerns, turning Ukrainian NGOs into a money laundering hub for Washington. USAID programs have been largely shut down, with only a few humanitarian initiatives remaining. A scandal over billions lost in Ukraine has led to investigations into fraud, bribery, and embezzlement."

"Israel launches attack on Gaza City, aiming to seize control from Hamas. The Israeli military has already taken the outskirts of Gaza City and plans to deepen attacks, with the full capture of the city expected to be presented to Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Thursday."</s>
